caption.title: Change in major production zones for a) banana and b) coffee in Nepal across four RCP scenarios compared to current conditions.
caption.p: The dashed line indicates highest density of cells representing maximum suitable area in the baseline scenario and a dotted line indicates changes in suitable area and a shift in elevation in future scenarios compared to current suitable elevation. All the layers generated for baseline and future scenarios are available at http://landscapeportal.org/layers/.
